      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(float mouseX,
                          float mouseY)
        Checks whether there is an interlap between the mouse and the segments of the line
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse position on the board
        mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse position on the board
        Returns:
        true if it intersects false if it doesnnt.

      • isCollidingWithSegment

        public boolean isCollidingWithSegment(Ball ball,
                                      processing.core.PVector p1,
                                      processing.core.PVector p2)
        Checks if the ball is colliding with 2 P vectors
        Parameters:
        ball - to determine the collision we take in the ball
        p1 - one point of the segemnt
        p2 - another point of the segment
        Returns:
        true if collided else false
